title: Runes Refunds
body: I not sure whether this only happens to me or something, After patching 7.22, all my friends have got a refunds of runes right away and I could get the refunds, i was curious whether you guys are giving those after some time or something because i have spent alot of ip in runes...........

replies.body: I was able to double check your account and I do see the Rune Collector mission in your list right now which will give you the BE, along with the Defender of the League mission which will give you the emote. Make sure you're checking your missions and completing those first to get your rune refunds, then you still need to open the orbs you get.
